explains: n. 规则；格言；训诫；命令

sentences.en: This precept has guided U.S. government policy for 30 years.
sentences.cn: 这一概念已经指导了美国政策30年。

sentences.en: I've found this precept to be extremely useful with my happiness project.
sentences.cn: 我发现这个规则对我的快乐计划特别有用。

sentences.en: That precept is the basis for my 11th Personal Commandment: No calculation.
sentences.cn: 这句箴言是我第11条个人戒律的基础：不要仅仅计较。
